notes: Object has a property called notes with a value on array.
JSON files always start with either an array [] or an {object}
JSON files cannot have comments, so put any comments in this array
Commas go between items in an array or object, but there should never be a trailing comma
All property names (like the notes at the top) must be in quotation marks
All string quotation marks must be in double quotes, like this one line
Use a linter like jsonlint.com to check the JSON
